channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool! (S7, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost City: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find the lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Day Off: Queen Thistle decides to take a day off, so Holly, Ben, Nanny and the King have to look after the naughty twins Daisy and Poppy for the day.
